msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Fixed Flex::distributeExtraWidth(), stop adding width to children when
there's less than 1 pixel of space left to distribute.
clipContent.  All of these properties are just delegated to the layout
property, so they must be preserved when the layout property changes.
QE Notes: Should work OK in Japanese
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Chipping away at the size of pure Flex 4 SWFs. We no longer inadvertedly link in the legacy Halo Container, Button, and Scrollbar, for pure Flex 4 applets. Baseline Flex 4 SWF drops to about 177K now (down from 220K).
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
The beginning of the open-source Flex SDK.
Populated the flex/sdk/trunk directory with an open-source subset of files from //depot/flex/sdk/...@191097 in the Faramir Perforce server. This changelist is a bit past the 3.0rc0 build.
The Ant scripts will not successfully build yet. They need to be adapted to the open-source subset.
